text: 3.10: Lo 27.26; Jer 11.3Mba khueŋ ndɨkndɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, mbe Moses suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui, mbe Fhe Bakɨme nɨman tɨvir vhuuiaŋ mbui gumgi gu mbigi ma. Mba ndɨkndɨga mbui gumgi gu mbigi, Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ mbe suaŋgi, “Gu mben farfagirga.” Ne khaŋ muuŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuiŋ ki gap khaŋ nzuai, “Guma za Moses suaŋgi tɨvi ki gavar ki tɨvi, ana za nta zɨn vui fhu, Fhe Bakɨme khaŋ suaŋgi, ‘Gu anan farfagirga.’ ”
